Cya in two weeks, Alten.

::Lavatron::

Lavatron laughs, firing another bolt at Snow Tech. He looks up and 
sees the tornado heading for him. Lighting hits him and is absorbed, 
but Lavatron steps back from Shadow Cat and tripps.

He falls backwards, his bulk heading for Snow Tech.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> I wont be able to post for about two weeks. I am going to my Aunts 
and they 
> don't have internet. i'll try to, but i doubt it. Sorry. you can go 
on with 
> out me though. I'll catch up!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> * Snow Tech looks at the bolt of electricity fired at him. He knew 
it would 
> be too late to get away, so he just stared at it with wide eye's. 
And, 
> before it hit him, he said the one thing he could think of.*
> 
> " Oh S@#$!!"
> 
> * The lightning shot through him, making his fur seemingly explode 
off his 
> body. The fur that was left on him, curled really tightly to his 
body, 
> making him look like a french-poodle. He bounced around and 
stuttering.*
> 
> " d-dd-d-dd-dd-d-ddd-d!"
> 
> *He jittered into the bush again, falling on his ass. It would be 
up to 
> Shadow Cat now.*
> 
> * Shadow Cat was flying high above the battle, oblivious to every 
thing till 
> two missles flew past her and exploded. She growled. This was 
getting 
> annoying. She lifted her arms to the sky and called with all her 
might for 
> the great forces of the air, her eyes turning a bright purple. the 
wind 
> began to pick-up around her and the clouds darkened. Electricity 
crackled 
> and roared towards her at her call. It condensed around her body, 
hugging 
> her like a lover might, until she was the lightning herself. She 
shaped 
> herself into a torpedo shape and shot down towards the pred. No way 
was she 
> going to miss this time!*
> 
> 
>
